p.center: Getting Started Guide -- Run the Test Suite

header.p: This document contains basic information on how to prepare and run the OpenEJB test suite.

section.title: 1 Running the test suite
section.p: To run the test suite, execute the following commands:

Windows:
prompt> build.bat jar
prompt> test.bat

Unix/Linux:
prompt$ build.sh jar
prompt$ test.sh
NOTE: You must execute the build and test scripts in the same directory where they are located.
